title: Rare Pikachu Card Expected to Sell for $50,000 at Auction
content:
A rare Pokemon card, called Pikachu illustrator, went up for auction this week on Heritage Auctions and the site expects it to sell for $50,000 USD.
Pikachu Illustrator was never sold as part of the Pokemon Trading Card Game. The card was created exclusively as a prize for winners of an illustration contest in the January 1998 issue of CoroCoro Comic, a monthly manga magazine published in Japan.
